name: reseller
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or company that sells something they have bought to someone else: The reseller can create their own brand, promote it, and efficiently sell the service themselves. Resellers are responsible for all content stored or transmitted under their reseller account and the actions of their clients.
More examplesFewer examplesThe clubs called for licensing of ticket resellers to discourage the passing of counterfeits.We transitioned the company from a products manufacturer to a products re-seller.They deliver their merchandise to vendors in the central market, which draws shoppers and resellers from all over the region.The discounted electricity supply was quickly reserved by resellers who wanted to use it to attract customers.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a company that buys products from manufacturers and sells them to customers: The company's PCs are sold by computer resellers and distributors. Ticket resellers once hired teenagers to stand in line to buy tickets for big events. See also
value-added resellerCompare
retailer
